name: Events App
description: Listinng app for events to buy or register for an event

scripts.postdeploy: CONFIG_VARS=$(echo $(heroku config -a events-app-vuejs --json)) && curl -n -X PATCH https://api.heroku.com/pipelines/c9820d71-fae3-47c2-9d87-c13543b37b95/stage/review/config-vars -d "$CONFIG_VARS" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -H "Accept: application/vnd.heroku+json; version=3"
